title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat endpoint in chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark/light themes, mobile-ready).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built TUI for interactive chats, model search, and local model housekeeping.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a free local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Kotlin & Scala friendly) with synchronous, reactive, and streaming APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; supports chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into a server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-dagster
summary: Dagster integration for batch LLM inference pipelines using Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds local AI commands (summarize, rewrite, translate) via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack component to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed requests/responses and async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Curated Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Grafana, and GPU monitoring.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain for private Q&A.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that proxies to Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that exposes an OpenAI-compatible completions endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 or GCP instances with Ollama pre-installed.
